Sentencas: Glass seals utilized in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) can be subject to modification through the incorporation of oxide additives to bolster their mechanical strength.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This research focuses on a novel class of additives, specifically protective coating materials designed for alloy interconnects.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is crucial to emphasize that the glass seal interfaces directly with the protective coating, bypassing direct contact with the alloy itself.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The efficacy of this approach is exemplified through the utilization of Ni-Co spinel-based oxide, established as an effective protective substance for stainless steel interconnects.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The introduction of a minute quantity of Ni-Co oxides does not induce alterations in the glass seal properties, encompassing phase structure, microstructure, thermal expansion coefficient (CTE), and softening behavior.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-Co oxide additive serves to mitigate the glass devitrification tendency, leading to a substantial augmentation in shear strength at the seal -interconnect interface and a marked enhancement in sealing properties.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite seal, enriched with 3.0 wt% Ni-Co oxide, showcases superior sealing performance, demonstrating exceptional stability throughout a rigorous 1200-h test.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The average leakage rate during this test period stands at 0.0024 sccm.cm(-1).
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The incorporation of Ni-Co oxide triggers the formation of needle-shaped crystals, playing a pivotal role in averting channel void formation and augmenting the bonding strength between the seal and interconnect.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Consequently, this fortifies gas tightness, ensuring the maintenance of outstanding sealing performance over an extended duration.
Titulo: Ni-Co spinel based oxide as new type of additive to glass seal for solid oxide fuel cells
